channel.description: Recent content in Makes on Glyn Darkin

item.title: Crowd funding, Drones, 3D Printing and the Digital Economy
item.description: As software is eating our world; how we buy, build and consume products is changing. This is a story about the Digital Economy and my experience dabbling in it. Crowd funding It started about a year ago when I backed a new project on KickStarter. They had a nice idea for a Drone that could collapse down and fit in your pocket (large pocket). They had a slick video and got some good media attention.
